name: Reviving Ellie
description:
What if everything could go back to how it used to be?

What if you could talk to who's passed away?

What would you do?

 ~

THIS IS A VISUAL NOVEL DEMO CREATED FOR THE INDIE GAME MAKING CONTEST: REBIRTH [2022] 



This game was made by LuminousDream Company.

Nozaki-sama: project leader and proofreader

TaigaBlu: script and story developer

fiery_Lux: artist and co-developer

Other credits

- Sprites by Kadokawa

- Music by Kevin MacLeod, lemonmusicstudio, Mixkit

- Objects and images by  openclipart-vectors, clker-free-vector-images, ricinator, mohamed_hassan, fosforito, gdakaska

- Translation and English adaptation by MonTheDog
